alert.note: Alert for San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 1:52PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Showers producing small hail will impact portions of northwestern Santa Cruz, southeastern San Mateo and west central Santa Clara Counties through 215 PM PDT... At 151 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers producing small hail 11 miles west of Boulder Creek, or 17 miles southwest of Saratoga, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palo Alto, Cupertino, Los Altos Hills, Woodside, Portola Valley and Loyola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains
